name: 劉傳銘
objective: 本課程提供行動計算上一些主題之深入介紹，這些主題包括：(1)行動通訊及系統介紹，(2)資料管理(3)行動資料庫及交易管理(4)位置管理(5)行動IP(6)單一/多人路由
schedule:
Introduction to Mobile Computing (3 hrs)
Research Issues in Mobile Computing (3 hrs)
Data Management and Dissemination (6 hrs)
Paper Reviews (9 hrs)
P2P Networks (3 hrs)
Mobile Ad-Hoc Networks (6 hrs)
Wireless Sensor Networks (6 hrs)
Paper Review (9 hrs)
Mobile IP (3 hrs)
Recent Trends in Mobile Computing (6 hrs)
scorePolicy:
Class Participation:   5%
Presentation:         30%
Midterm Report:       15%
Case Study:           50%
materials:
Mobile Computing, Rai Kamal, Oxford University Press, 2007. ISBN0-19-568677-2
Ad Hoc Wireless Networks, C. Siva Ram Murthy and B. S. Manjo, Prentice Hall, 2004.
Mobile Ad Hoc Networking, S. Basagni, M. Conti, and S. Giordano, I Stojmenovic (ed.), IEEE Press, Wiley-Interscience, 2004.
Handbook of Wireless Networks and Mobile Computing, I. Stojmenovic (ed.), Wiley, 2002.
Mobile Communication, J. Schiller, Addison-Wesley, 2000.
Data Management for Mobile Computing, E. Pitoura and G. Samaras, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1998.
Mobile Computing, T.  Imielinski and H. Korth, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1996.
